Module kivakit.data.compression
Package com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.tree

Class Tree<Symbol>

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.data.compression.codecs.huffman.tree.Tree<Symbol>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Tree<Symbol>>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Leaf, Node
public abstract class Tree<Symbol> extends Object implements Comparable<Tree<Symbol>>
A Huffman coding tree, composed of Node and Leaf subtrees. Symbols in the tree are assigned a code with encode() and the encoded symbols can be retrieved with codedSymbols(). Symbols can be decoded with decode(BitReader), which reads compressed data with BitReader and walks the tree until it finds the code symbol.
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
